OrgName: Rexnord Corporation and its subsidiaries and affiliates in the United States
activities: Rexnord will use and otherwise process European Employee Data in the United States for the following purposes: Workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; Compensation planning and administration, such as stock plan administration, compensation analysis and bonus (MIC) administration; Performance management, such as administering and reporting learning and development programs; Talent management, such as headcount reporting, organizational reporting and charting, shift and or scheduled hours, maintaining SAP employee master file and succession planning; Service anniversaries in quarterly newsletter; Hire and job change article on the intranet; Updates to Global Address Book and Company Directory; Facilitating acquisitions, mergers and related transactions; and Monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Lithuania, Netherlands, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner.
